explains: n. 入会，入会仪式；开始，创始；（某项活动或技能的）入门，初学
wordGroup: crack initiation 裂纹萌生；裂纹开裂

sentences.en: This was my initiation into the peace movement.
sentences.cn: 那是我加入和平运动的开始。

sentences.en: They also focused on important rituals that appeared to preserve a people's social structure, such as initiation ceremonies that formally signify children's entrance into adulthood.
sentences.cn: 他们还注重于那些似乎能保存一个民族社会结构的重要仪式，比如正式标志着孩子进入成年的入会仪式。

sentences.en: I chose to use an initiation queue per host instead of per agent.
sentences.cn: 我选择对每个主机而不是每个代理使用一个启动队列。
